opt-unique-ref.label: Unique reference number
opt-unique-ref.hint: You can find this in the email we sent you when you first created an eVisa account.

opt-passport-number.label: Passport number
opt-passport-number.hint: This can contain letters and numbers For example. ‘120383978A’.

opt-other-ref.label: Other
opt-other-ref.hint: This could be an Incident Number (INC), National ID card number or a Global Web Form (GWF) number.

sent-email.legend: Has the home office sent you an email

tech-problem.legend: Do you have a technical problem?

email.label: Email address
email.hint: We will reply to this email address

contact-number.label: Contact number (optional)
contact-number.hint: We may call you to ask for more details

question.label: Enter your question below. Provide as much detail as possible

contacted.legend: The Home Office conducts research about experiences using products and services. Would you like to be contacted further about your experience using this service
contacted.hint: IF you agree to take part in the future research blah blah blah...
